data_table.description: Anthropometry Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ANT1
variable.description: Q1. A. Determination of ability to stand. Assessment of ability to stand [Anthropometry Form]
variable.value: Can stand erectly on both feet
Can stand on both feet, but posture not erect

variable.name: ANT2A
variable.description: Q2a. Self report. Self reported weight [Anthropometry Form]

variable.name: ANT2B
variable.description: Q2b. Self report. Self reported weight units [Anthropometry Form]

variable.name: ANT3
variable.description: Q3. Measured height, weight, and bio-impedance. Standing height [Anthropometry Form]

variable.name: ANT4
variable.description: Q4. Measured height, weight, and bio-impedance. Weight [Anthropometry Form]

variable.name: ANT5
variable.description: Q5. Measured height, weight, and bio-impedance. Fat [Anthropometry Form]

variable.name: ANT6
variable.description: Q6. Measured height, weight, and bio-impedance. Impedance [Anthropometry Form]

variable.name: ANT7
variable.description: Q7. Measured height, weight, and bio-impedance. Fat mass [Anthropometry Form]

variable.name: ANT8
variable.description: Q8. Measured height, weight, and bio-impedance. Lean body mass (Ffm) [Anthropometry Form]

variable.name: ANT9
variable.description: Q9. Measured height, weight, and bio-impedance. Total body water (Tbw) [Anthropometry Form]

variable.name: ANT10A
variable.description: Q10.a D. Body size. Waist girth [Anthropometry Form]

variable.name: ANT10B
variable.description: Q10b. D. Body size. Hip girth [Anthropometry Form]
